section.name: Copied and pasted code is usually bad
section.p: But it can be hard to find, especially in a large project. So we wrote a utility - CPD - to find it for us. CPD uses (more or less) Michael Wise's Greedy String Tiling algorithm to find duplicate code. Here's a screenshot of CPD after running on itself. Looks like we've got some refactoring to do....
To run CPD as a JNLP application, click here.
